data.title: CDFA Now Accepting Applications for Annual Cannabis Cultivation Licenses
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The California Department of Food and Agriculture’s CalCannabis program has begun accepting applications for annual commercial licenses for cultivators, nurseries, and processors.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California Department of Food and Agriculture

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
